channel.title: Bao Nguyen - Algorithm Trading
channel.description: Welcome to my blog, where I delve into the exciting world of coding and algorithmic trading. Follow me as I explore the latest advancements in these dynamic fields.

item.title: Volume Profile and Value Area in trading
item.author: Bao Nguyen
item.description: Volume profile is a technical analysis tool used in trading to help traders understand market activity and price action. It is essentially a way of visualizing the volume of trades that occur at different price levels for a specific stock, currency, or commodity. By analyzing volume profile, traders can gain insights into market sentiment, support and resistance levels, and the overall supply and demand for a given asset. In this post, we will explore:
